etymology.description: phonetic: 文(文) (wén, "text") + semantic: 彡(彡) (shān, "decorative lines") = conveys the idea of literary talent or variegated patterns -> final meaning "variegated; literary talent"
etymology.interpretation: The character combines 文(文) (wén, "text"), which suggests a relation to writing or literature, with 彡(彡) (shān, "decorative lines"), which adds the sense of variation or ornamentation, fitting for the meanings of literary talent and variegated patterns.
